## Max bio 

- Former online poker pro on PokerStars. Played over 10m hands, including <abbr title="Record for most ever played in a month above microstakes">990k in Dec, 2009</abbr>.

- AI poker work: 

  - MSc with thesis on AI poker at Technion Israel Institute of Technology with [Nahum Shimkin](https://webee.technion.ac.il/shimkin/index.html)

  - [AI Poker Tutorial v1 website](https://aipokertutorial.com) (needs updating!)

  - [Two poker research papers](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Chiswick,+M) with [Sam Ganzfried](http://www.ganzfriedresearch.com/)

- [Blog](https://chisness.substack.com)
